name: Chaimae Abdelaziz
description: '''Chaima Doublal''', known professionally as '''Chaimae Abdelaziz''' ({{langx|ar|شيماء عبدالعزيز}}) is a Moroccan Singer who rose to popularity as a contestant in the fourth season of [[The Voice Ahla Sawt]], broadcast on [[MBC 1 (Middle East and North Africa)|MBC]]. She sang various songs of both Moroccan and Middle-Eastern repertoires and reached the quart-finals.
